snippet: The wedding was held at the Harry S. Truman Little White House in Key West, Fla.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Kate Elizabeth Koplan and Gregory Caldwell Little were married Saturday evening in Key West, Fla., at the Harry S. Truman Little White House, a museum. Elizabeth Auer, a Florida notary public, officiated. Ernest L. Sarason Jr., an associate justice of Boston Municipal Court, led the ceremony. Dr. Koplan, 34, will keep her name. She is the director of medical management at Atrius Health, a nonprofit alliance of six group medical practices in eastern Massachusetts. She also practices internal medicine at one of those practices, Harvard Vanguard Medical Associates in Boston. She graduated from Yale and received a medical degree and a public health degree from Emory.
